description: You are in an antechamber. On the floor lies and old bedroll, and the charred remnants of a fire are beneath the window. Someone has been camping here. To the West you see the castle entrance. There is a wooden door to the East.
hidden: You examine the campsite. The firepit is cold, and appears to be several weeks old. In the bedroll you find a steel dagger and a glass bottle full of a clear, irridescent liquid.
